content: the top of the chain 4 r6 slip_stitch into the nearest corner space chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet in the corner rr66 sequence * corner 2hdc chain 2 2hdc side 2hdc in the space between the 2tr from r5 2hdc in each of the next 4 sps then 2hdc in the space between the treble_crochet from r5 * repeat x3 join with a slip_stitch into the top of chain 2 fasten_off and weave in ends 4 the great granny adventures a free year-long crochet mystery the first thread of mystery… is solved tag me @yarnivormakes so i can share and admire your squares the adventure isn t over next month s piece arrives 15th feb 5
